Query:
SELECT
				     sctl.ID,
					 tt.TransactionName,
					 et1.EnumValue,
					 ct.NotificationCode,
				     DATE_FORMAT(sctl.CreateTime, ${DateTimeFormat}),
					 DATE_FORMAT(sctl.LastUpdateTime, ${DateTimeFormat}),
					 sctl.SourceMDN,
					 srcPkTemp.Description,
					 et3.EnumValue,
					 sctl.DestMDN,
					 destpkTemp.Description,
					 et2.EnumValue AS destPocketStatus,
					 round(sctl.TransactionAmount, 2),
				     round(sctl.CalculatedCharge, 2),
				     round(sctl.TransactionAmount+sctl.CalculatedCharge, 2),
					 cc.ChannelName,
					 sctl.InvoiceNo
				FROM
				     enum_text et1,enum_text et2, enum_text et3, commodity_transfer ct INNER JOIN pocket srcPocket ON ct.SourcePocketID = srcPocket.ID
					 INNER JOIN pocket destPocket ON ct.DestPocketID = destPocket.ID
				     INNER JOIN service_charge_txn_log sctl ON ct.ID = sctl.CommodityTransferID
					 INNER JOIN transaction_type tt ON tt.ID= sctl.TransactionTypeID
				     INNER JOIN pocket_template destpkTemp ON destpkTemp.ID = destPocket.PocketTemplateId
					 INNER JOIN pocket_template srcPkTemp ON srcPkTemp.ID = srcPocket.PocketTemplateId
					 INNER JOIN channel_code cc ON sctl.ChannelCodeID = cc.ID
				WHERE
					 destpkTemp.ID IN (SELECT ParameterValue from system_parameters where ParameterName = 'pocket_template_unregistered')
					 AND sctl.TransactionTypeID= tt.ID
					 AND et1.TagID=6089 AND sctl.status=et1.EnumCode
					 AND et2.TagID=5051 AND destPocket.status=et2.EnumCode
					 AND et3.TagID=5051 AND srcPocket.status=et3.EnumCode
					 AND sctl.CreateTime >= ${StartTime}
					 AND sctl.CreateTime < ${EndTime}
					 AND ct.SourceMDN like ${SourceMDN} 
					 AND ct.DestMDN like ${DestinationMDN} 
				ORDER BY
				     sctl.CreateTime ASC
